content: As some of you know, I came here to further the conquest of const-eval. But alas, my unfamiliarity with the compiler internals as well as the lack of easy/mentor issues on the topic became a deterrent. But I decided to follow the roundabout way of teaching myself the compiler by picking up... Other issues! So hit me with issues that would help me gain experience in that area, if you're willing to mentor or if you think someone with a couple of small PRs merged can pick up!
@Hameer Abbasi You might interested in checking out #t-compiler/const-eval, it's where most of the discussion happens.
I don't understand too much there, even though I do read it from time to time. :smile:
